definitions.text: a performance of a musical composition or a dramatic role etc.
examples: they heard a live rendition of three pieces by Schubert

definitions.text: an explanation of something that is not immediately obvious
examples: the edict was subject to many interpretations
he annoyed us with his interpreting of parables
often imitations are extended to provide a more accurate rendition of the child's intended meaning

definitions.text: handing over prisoners to countries where torture is allowed
the act of interpreting something as expressed in an artistic performance
examples: her rendition of Milton's verse was extraordinarily moving
